
# My Package

This package is custom built to modify rec letters for S. Lueders (Author)

## Installation

```bash
pip install rec-transcriber-jdo


Usage: rec-transcriber-jdo <input_filename.pdf> <font> <font-size>



Font Options
You can use the following fonts by passing their respective arguments:

Font Name	Argument
Helvetica	helv
Times New Roman	times
Arial	arial
Courier	cour
Verdana	verdana
Tahoma	tahoma
Georgia	georgia
Palatino	palatino
Garamond	garamond
Bookman	bookman
Avant Garde	avantgarde
Comic Sans MS	comicsans
Impact	impact
Trebuchet MS	trebuchet
Century Gothic	centurygothic
Lucida Sans	lucidasans
Franklin Gothic	franklingothic
Rockwell	rockwell
Futura	futura
Gill Sans	gillsans
Optima	optima
Candara	candara
Corbel	corbel
Eras	eras
Stencil	stencil
OCR A	ocra
Perpetua	perpetua
Charcoal	charcoal
Copperplate Gothic	copperplate
Apple Chancery	applechancery
Brush Script	brushscript
Monaco	monaco
Lucida Console	lucidaconsole
Wingdings	wingdings
Zapf Dingbats	zapfdingbats
Herculanum	herculanum
Gill Sans MT	gillsansmt
Calisto MT	calistomt
Baskerville	baskerville
Geneva	geneva
Skia	skia
Papyrus	papyrus
Luminari	luminari
Chalkduster	chalkduster
Marker Felt	markerfelt
Zapfino	zapfino
Hoefler Text	hoeflertext
Didot	didot
Big Caslon	bigcaslon
